nodes.text: Kennerlo Erlo lived on the planet Coruscant and served as a police officer with the Coruscant Security Force. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, he supplied his fellow officers with light armor from a small shop near the taxi station in Black Sun territory.
Kennerlo was a Human male with dark brown hair, black eyes, and fair skin. Berric wore a Coruscant Security Force uniform and carried a side arm blaster pistol.

Kennerlo appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a light armor vendor on Coruscant. The Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide gave him a last name, though misspelled his first as "Kennerio."
